name: market for cement, CEM V/A | cement, CEM V/A | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/880/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'cement, CEM V/A' in the Global geography.;In this market, expert judgement was used to develop product specific transport distance estimations.;The product 'cement,CEM V/A' represents cement (CEM V/A), also known as Composite Cement. This product is made of clinker, blast furnace slag 18-30% and 18-30% alternative constituents (weight-%). Alternative constituents may include pozzolan and/or flue ash, besides granulated blast furnace slag. Cement is used for concrete production.

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'cement, CEM V/A'  within the geography of Global.

This activity ends with the supply of 'cement, CEM V/A' to the consumers of this product. Transport is included. Product losses during transportation are assumed negligible and are therefore not included.
category: C:Manufacturing/23:Manufacture of other non-metallic mineral products/239:Manufacture of non-metallic mineral products n.e.c./2394:Manufacture of cement, lime and plaster
